definition: a quick squirt of some liquid, usually carbonated water, to cover a location wholly or partially by quickly squirting a liquid onto it
details:
noun
- a quick squirt of some liquid, usually carbonated water
= example: a quick squirt of some liquid, usually carbonated water
verb
- to cover a location wholly or partially by quickly squirting a liquid onto it
= example: to cover a location wholly or partially by quickly squirting a liquid onto it
